languages.text: "Я не решусь взять на себя такую ответственность и определить их вину, Ваша Светлость. Скорее, я считаю обвинения губернатора Драйвстема достойными внимания".

traits.locale_text: "Я не решусь взять на себя такую ответственность и определить их вину, Ваша Светлость. Скорее, я считаю обвинения губернатора Драйвстема достойными внимания. Он бы не стал выдвигать их без уверенности в собственной правоте".
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."
languages.original_text: "Я не решусь взять на себя такую ответственность и определить их вину, Ваша Светлость. Скорее, я считаю обвинения губернатора Драйвстема достойными внимания".

traits.locale_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and decide their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do find the Governor Drivestem's accusations noteworthy, however.
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and decide their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do find the Governor Drivestem's accusations noteworthy, however.
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do find Governor Drivestem's accusations sound, however.
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do find Governor Drivestem's accusations sound, however.
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: 「陛下、そのような重大責任を負うことも有罪宣告することも、私の身には重すぎます。ですが、ドライブステン総督の告発は検討に値するものだと思います」
languages.original_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、そのような重大責任を負うことも有罪宣告することも、私の身には重すぎます。ですが、ドライブステン総督の告発は検討に値するものだと思います」
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: “我不敢妄下结论为他们定罪，大人。不过，我认为德莱夫斯塔总督的指控值得仔细考虑。”
languages.original_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."

traits.locale_text: “我不敢妄下结论为他们定罪，大人，但我相信德莱夫斯塔总督不会无缘无故冤枉他们。”
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: « Je ne me risquerai pas à juger s'ils sont coupables ou innocents, Votre Seigneurie. Cela dit, les accusations du gouverneur Drivestem méritent de s'y intéresser. »
languages.original_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne me risquerai pas à juger s'ils sont coupables ou innocents, Votre Seigneurie. Cela dit, les accusations du gouverneur Drivestem me semblent tenir la route. »
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: «Yo no asumiría tal responsabilidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo, creo que las acusaciones del gobernador Drivestem merecen una verificación».
languages.original_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."

traits.locale_text: «Yo no asumiría tal responsabilidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo, las acusaciones del gobernador Drivestem parecen sólidas.
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Ich würde mir niemals anmaßen, über ihre Schuld zu urteilen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich glaube jedoch, dass man Gouverneur Drivestems Anschuldigungen nachgehen sollte."
languages.original_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde mir niemals anmaßen, über ihre Schuld zu urteilen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mir erscheinen Gouverneur Drivestems Vorwürfe jedoch einleuchtend."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, böyle bir mesuliyeti kendime biçip hüküm vermek bana düşmez. Ancak Vali Drivestem'in ithamlarını dikkate değer bulmuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I would not take such a responsibility upon myself and rule on their guilt, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do think Governor Drivestem's accusations are worthy of consideration, however."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, böyle bir mesuliyeti kendime biçip hüküm vermek bana düşmez. Ancak Vali Drivestem'in ithamlarını dikkate değer bulmuyorum."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
